AMNESIA.DESCRIPTION: When you Remember a card, if you have Amnesia, Exhaust the card and reduce your Amnesia by 1.

AWAKEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the Forgotten condition from a Forgotten card anywhere in play, and add it to your hand. NL This does not count as Remembering the card.

FORGET.DESCRIPTION: A Forgotten card's effect is hidden, and its cost set to 1, until played.

INSOMNIA.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Forget a card, all creatures lose HP equal to their Insomnia, then reduce it by 1.

REMEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Removes the Forgotten condition from a card and plays it.

TRANCE.DESCRIPTION: Causes Forgotten cards to become Urgent and cost 0 to play.

URGENT.DESCRIPTION: Must be played before any other cards. If there are multiple Urgent cards in your hand, you may choose the order in which you play them.
